items.title: Parts and Services
items.subtitle: YOU CAN COUNT ON
items.lead:
​​People tell you stories about quality, commitment and innovation. But for the real story, take a close look at the numbers. In an industry where an hour of downtime can cost thousands, Sandvik parts and services can save you millions, with around-the-clock service, qualified engineers and genuine parts on demand.

​​

children.title: Service programs
children.subtitle: Productivity you can count on
children.description: Meet your production targets in smarter, faster and more cost efficient ways.
children.lead: When you can predict your productivity you predict profitability. Sandvik service programs are about optimizing performance 365 days a year. It’s about removing risk from your operations from the minute equipment is delivered through it's operating life to make it run as efficient as possible.
children.body: ​* Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Start-up services
children.subtitle: Get your mine moving
children.description: Everything you need, from financial support to equipment relocation planning, strip and assembly. Explore our Start-up Services
children.lead: ​Quicker start-up means a faster path to profit. Our complete portfolio of start-up services helps you get up and running as quickly as possible, cutting out hindrances and adding weeks of additional production time compared to going it alone.
children.body:
​Our start-up services
From finance to relocation

Our start-up services provide everything you need, from financial support to equipment relocation planning, strip and assembly, commissioning and local adaptions while ensuring compliance with local legislations and specific mine requirements.

children.title: Money for your mine
children.subtitle: Tailored finance & credit services
children.description: Benefit from customized credit services with competitive rates and flexible finance terms. Explore our Financial Services
children.lead: ​Financing opens up a world of possibilities for expanding your business and maximizing profitability. Our in-house financing services company Sandvik Credit offers competitive interest rates, flexible finance terms and the benefit of working with a finance provider that understands your industry.
children.body:
​Flexible financial services

When you choose Sandvik Credit, you’re harnessing a wealth of knowledge and expertise behind your products and machinery. We understand your business, your challenges and what you need from finan-cial services. We offer you everything from leasing and rent-to-purchase with flexible payment plans. Our local colleagues give you the personal attention you need to structure loans or leases according to your application and maintenance needs.

children.title: Ramp-up services
children.subtitle: For quicker profits
children.description: Get your equipment up and running faster. Explore our Ramp-up Services
children.lead: ​Our ramp-up services program helps you get production up and running in the shortest time. It can add up to five weeks of additional production compared to a “do it alone" approach.
children.body:
​A FASTER WAY TO START UP

Adding new generation equipment to older fleets requires training and the personnel familiarizing themselves with the new fleet. By using our ramp-up services, you minimize integration and start-up time. 

 

RAMP-UP SERVICES INCLUDE:

  • Training in product safety, processes, equipment components and functions, operation and maintenance and more
  • Stock planning to set the level of spares and wears on site
  • Maintenance planning to set the maintenance schedule for each piece of equipment, and a troubleshooting guide
  • One year process optimization

 

* Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Commissioning services
children.subtitle: Efficient equipment performance from day one
children.description: Coordinate engineering, procurement and construction activities for a speedy start-up. Explore our commissioning Services
children.lead: ​As soon as your equipment gets to its designated delivery point a Sandvik specialist will calibrate and set it up to ensure effective performance from the start.
children.body:
Fast track your equipment deployment

Achieve the fastest possible startup and reach optimal performance quickly. Our commissioning teams work with your engineers to plan and complete a safe, well-designed, best-in-class facility delivered on time and according to plan.



Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Relocation services
children.subtitle: Moving the world for your equipment
children.description: Planning and logistics management to reduce downtime and save costs. Explore our Relocation Services
children.lead: ​Sandvik ensures that all of your equipment arrives at your designated point, ready for commissioning. We check that machines and parts meet all legislation and customer safety requirements upon arrival.
children.body:
Worry-free relocation

Our engineers take the stress out of equipment relocation. We have everything in place to transport equipment from Sandvik facilities or another mine to your site. Our services include disassembling equipment to get it underground and reassembling it, so it’s ready for commissioning.

children.title: Maintenance and repair services
children.subtitle: Do away with downtime
children.description: Enjoy greater uptime, longer equipment lifetime and complete cost control. Explore our Maintenance and Repair Services
children.lead: Proper maintenance and repair services help prevent downtime. Count on us to provide Sandvik trained technicians to assist with either scheduled maintenance or unscheduled damage repairs.  By selecting a Sandvik service agreement that provides you with maintenance planning and repair services you can gain up to 10 days of production by not having to wait for parts or service.
children.body:
Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.

children.subtitle: Boost production time by weeks
children.description: Keep your products in the best working order with our condition inspection, Maintenance planning, Protective and performance services  Explore our Product services
children.lead: ​Boost your technical capacity, equipment reliability and operational productivity. Our product services get your equipment up and running faster, keep everything running smoother, and prevent costly downtime. Why leave anything to chance?
children.body: ​Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Supervisory planning services
children.subtitle: Keep performance at its peak
children.description:
Training, monitoring and planning support services that keep everything operating at peak performance. 
Explore our Supervisory and Planning Services
children.lead: ​Keeping equipment running at peak performance requires specialized knowledge and skill. Sandvik Supervisory services include Training Support and Planning Support contracts to ensure best practices are reached to maintain peak performance.
children.body:
Planning Support—stay on top of your equipment

Tracking the vital statistics of your equipment keeps you up to date on how it's being used, how it's performing and helps predict and plan upcoming work to keep it performing at its best. Our planning personnel and state of the art systems help make sure everything runs optimally.

Ensuring parts are available when you need them can reduce downtime by an average 20%. Smart planning means fewer parts held in stock, better planned work, less machine failure.

 

Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.

 

 

 * Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Fully outsourced maintenance services
children.subtitle: Peace of mind to focus on production
children.description: Expertly-trained service and breakdown crews to manage all aspects of plant maintenance. Explore our Fully outsourced services
children.lead: ​Fully outsourcing maintenance services leaves you free to concentrate on increasing production and profitability in your mine. It saves you the trouble of recruiting and developing an in-house maintenance department.
children.body:
Service and breakdown expertise

Our on-site service crews optimize work execution and quality, minimizing unexpected downtime thanks to more reliable equipment. This results in quick repair times and fewer breakdowns. Our experts know all about your equipment reliability and help you better manage production schedules.


Advanced maintenance planning

Tracking the vital statistics of your equipment keeps you up to date on how it's being used, how it's performing and helps predict and plan upcoming work to keep it performing at its best. Our planning personnel and state of the art systems help make sure everything runs optimally.


Performance reporting 

Our technicians report on equipment performance and recommend the necessary action to maintain the highest possible efficiency levels.


Equipment audits

These audits give you a full picture of equipment lifecycles and more cost-efficient equipment management.


Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.

children.title: Expert services
children.subtitle: Boost availability and performance
children.description: The help you need to proactively drive equipment availability and performance.  Explore our Expert Services
children.lead: ​Our reliable expert services provide you with in-depth support to proactively drive equipment availability and performance.
children.body:
​Minimize the risk of equipment failure

Addressing potential failure minimizes your breakdown risk. Our product and application experts determine the technical status of your equipment and offer qualified support in decisions about new maintenance schedules, investments in operator training or machine rebuilds.

children.title: Consumables, Fluids & Kits
children.subtitle: Longer life and lower cost of ownership
children.description: Genuine, high-quality materials that are the perfect fit for performing in your harsh, unpredictable conditions.
children.lead: ​Non-genuine parts and low quality fluids reduce the working life of machines and negatively impact production. Sandvik Original filters, as well as field-proven service and repair kits have been developedand tested to withstand the toughest conditions. The result is improved performance, higher reliability and reduced costs.
children.body:
Keep your operations moving

All of our consumables, fluids and kits are designed to fit perfectly with your equipment. They eliminate leakage, improve efficiency, extend service intervals and reduce the possibility of equipment failure.

children.title: Filters
children.subtitle: Safe, lasting performance
children.description: Genuine, high-quality Sandvik air filters, coolants, hydraulic filters and filter kits give you the perfect fit.  Explore Filters
children.lead: ​All filters may look the same, but there are huge differences in their ability to do their job. Only genuine, high-quality Sandvik filters can guarantee the perfect fit for lasting and safe performance, even in harsh, dusty, volatile and unpredictable conditions.
children.body: ​Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Sandvik Hydraulic oil filters
children.subtitle: Remove damaging particles from oil flow
children.description: Even under the harshest mining conditions, Sandvik hydraulic oil filters keep your system pro-tected. Explore Sandvik hydraulic filters
children.lead: ​Sandvik genuine hydraulic oil filters are designed to remove the particles from the oil flow that damage components like pumps, valves and motors. Protecting your equipment from contaminants also eliminates jerkiness and false movements in machines.
children.body: * ​Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Engine air filters
children.subtitle: A perfect fit every time
children.description: Thanks to a unique design, Sandvik engine air filters are compact, but have less air restriction and a longer lifetime. Explore Sandvik engine air filters
children.lead: ​Peak engine performance relies on a perfect fit. Sandvik engine air filters are compact yet powerful, and always guaranteed to deliver the right fit.
children.body: * Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Sandvik engine oil filters
children.subtitle: Protecting engines from abrasion and premature wear
children.lead: Sandvik genuine engine oil filters remove solid contaminants – such as dirt, carbon and metal particles – from the oil before they can damage bearing, journal and cylinder wall surfaces in the engine. They protect equipment from abrasion and premature wear.
children.body: ​Sandvik engine oil filters have a built-in bypass valve for extra safety, which prevents a plugged filter from starving the engine of lubrication. When differential pressure across the oil filter element exceeds a predetermined value – depending on the engine application – the bypass valve opens so oil can continue to flow to the engine, keeping vital parts lubricated.

children.title: Fuel Filters
children.subtitle: Optimize fuel performance
children.lead: ​Cleaner fuel means better performance. Sandvik fuel filters keep fuel free of particles and water to enhance performance and keep system pressure consistently high.
children.body: ​* Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Sandvik oil separators
children.subtitle: Complete oil separation
children.description: Almost complete separation of oil, keeps compressors running at maximum efficiency. Explore oil separators
children.lead: ​Specifically designed to work with our Sandvik compressors, Sandvik genuine oil separators almost completely separate oil, keeping compressors running at maximum efficiency.
children.body:
Durable and reliable

Sandvik oil separators use the principle of coalescence in which layers separate oil from the compressor and return it back. Together with low flow resistance, the process ensures minimum oil consumption while retaining high performance throughout the separator change interval.


Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Service and repair kits
children.subtitle: Field-proven kits to reduce risk and downtime
children.description: Maximize total performance and extend lifetime of all components using kits that include only Sandvik genuine partsExplore service and repair kits
children.lead: ​Sandvik service and repair kits are cost effective and convenient, ready-to-order kits that simplify the service process by ensuring you have everything you need, when you need it.  And be-cause the kits include only Sandvik genuine parts, you can be confident that they will perform as well as the components they replace.
children.body:
​A smarter way to service and repair

Sandvik service and repair kits are designed to maximize convenience and value. Each kit includes everything you need to complete repairs or replacements on your loading and hauling equipment, drill rigs or crushing and screening installation. By bundling an average of 10 to 20 part numbers into a single kit, you'll reduce the number of time-consuming purchase orders to multiple vendors.

children.title: Loading and hauling kits
children.subtitle: Optimize performance, extend operating life
children.description: Systems designed to meet the challenges of underground hard rock mining. Explore Loading and Hauling
children.lead: ​Our maintenance, endurance and repair kits offer practical, convenient solutions that include everything you need to run at peak efficiency and bring your equipment up to our OEM standards.
children.body:
Peace of mind

Sandvik maintenance, endurance and repair kits give you advanced engineering expertise in a compact package that makes servicing remote locations easier. We deliver direct from our warehouse to your mine to make loader upkeep faster and easier than ever. We also guarantee that all parts are genuine, original and manufactured to our highest OEM standards to ensure stable performance, reliability and durability in your harsh mining conditions.

children.subtitle: Field-proven kits to reduce risk and downtime
children.description: Everything you need to perform key repairs simultaneously and minimize downtime. Explore Drill rigs
children.lead: ​After carefully examining rock drill maintenance we have bundled key parts into practical kits for specific functional tasks. These kits provide everything you need to perform key repairs simultaneously and minimize downtime.
children.body:
Minimize maintenance 

Sandvik rock drill kits consist of genuine OEM parts and are manufactured to the highest standards to en-sure stable performance, reliability and durability in harsh mining environments. Our kits are customized for all aspects of rock drill maintenance and can extend intervals between service by up to 50%.

children.title: Crushing and screening kits
children.subtitle: Lower your cost of ownership
children.description: Complete service and repair kits to make sure your crushers continue outperforming.Explore Crushing and Screening
children.lead: ​Reliable and efficient equipment operation is crucial for optimizing costs. Sandvik crushing and screening kits are bundled to give you everything you need to perform key repairs simultaneously, minimizing downtime.
children.body:
Extend the working life of your equipment

Genuine Sandvik parts keep your equipment functioning at its best and safest. Built using proven technology and the highest quality materials, Sandvik crushing and screening kits help you achieve production targets and increase equipment lifetimes. Genuine parts are the result of years of testing in the harshest conditions, reducing the risk of breakdowns and ensuring optimal equipment performance.



Wear parts

Genuine OEM wear parts ensure optimal performance and increase productivity for all crusher types. Our standard, premium and customized liners are built in our own foundries, ensuring consistent quality, predictable service life, perfect fit and high availability.

Spare parts

Orderquality spare parts for each crusher and screen to ensure maximum reliability and extended component life.

children.subtitle: Enhance performance and minimize downtime
children.description: Complete service and repair kits to make sure your crushers continue outperforming. Explore Crushing and Screening.
children.lead: ​Our maintenance, endurance and repair kits offer practical, convenient solutions that include everything you need to run continuous miners and other cutting machines at peak efficiency and bring your equipment up to the latest Sandvik standards.
children.body:
​Peace of mind

Sandvik maintenance, endurance and repair kits for give you advanced engineering expertise in a compact package that makes servicing remote locations easier. We deliver direct from our warehouse to your worksite to make equipment upkeep faster and easier than ever. We also guarantee that all parts are genuine, original and manufactured to our highest standards. All kits consist of genuine OEM parts and are manufactured to the highest standards to ensure stable performance, reliability and durability in harsh mining environments.

children.subtitle: Enhance availability and performance
children.description: Extend the lifetime of your equipment and parts, and save on unexpected downtime.
children.lead: ​The stakes are high for mining and materials handling equipment. Keeping your equipment in excellent shape is vital for uninterrupted productivity.
children.body:
​Exceeding expectations

Upgrade your fleet and outfit your equipment with the latest technology. Benefit from increased productivity, improved safety and extended working hours. Our Equipment improvements enable equipment to function at its best to achieve demanding production targets

children.title: Loading and Hauling
children.subtitle: Flexibility and a longer life
children.description: From improvements, upgrades and wear protection for key machine elements to fire suppression and proximity detection, we keep you running safely and smoothly. Explore Loading and hauling
children.lead: ​Superior engineering, innovative design and precision manufacturing help ensure peak performance, longevity and significant savings.
children.body:
​Better solutions for loading and hauling

From ground engaging tools (GET) and buckets to equipment upgrades to fire suppression and software services, Sandvik helps you maximize returns on your hard-rock underground loading and hauling.

children.title: Ground engaging tools (GET)
children.subtitle: Higher bucket productivity, longer life
children.description: Our proven ground engaging tools (GET) are designed to meet the challenges of hard rock mining and can be customized to suit your needs.  Explore GET
children.lead: ​Our proven ground engaging tools (GET)—mechanical or weld on—are designed to meet the challenges of hard rock underground mining and can be customized to suit your bucket loading needs.
children.body: ​Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Wear protection buckets
children.subtitle: A ‘total bucket concept’for total productivity
children.description: Get total engineering flexibility with a total-concept solution that improves overall productivity while reducing maintenance costs.  Explore wear protection buckets
children.lead: ​Designed with total flexibility in mind, our optimally engineered buckets for underground loaders deliver the highest quality standards in both structural design and manufacturing.
children.body: Sandvik wear protection buckets focus on four key areas: optimal design, fabrication standards, highest quality steel and ground engaging tools (GET). This total bucket concept delivers a solution to improve overall productivity, reduce maintenance costs and deliver a tangible return on your investment.

children.title: Fire suppression systems
children.subtitle: Fast, effective fire protection
children.description: Fast protection that limits the consequences of a fire.Explore fire suppression
children.lead: ​Effective and easy to use, our fire suppression systems help ensure the safety of your personnel and loading and hauling equipment.
children.body:
​Our fire suppression systems feature our world-first Eclipse™foam, which suppresses fires faster and minimizes environmental impact. Eclipse™foam is specifically designed to suppress hydrocarbon fuel and oil fires. When a hydrocarbon fuel ignites, the vapors and not the fuel burns. Eclipse™foam cuts off the oxygen supply, acting as a vapor seal over the fuel, while the water content in the foam cools the area, greatly reducing the risk of re-ignition.

 

Eclipse is only applicable for markets where operational temperatures do not fall below 0 degrees Celsius.

children.title: Underground drill rigs
children.subtitle: Optimize performance and longevity
children.description: Safety improvements, software services, upgrades, leases and custom engineered solu-tions keep your underground drilling operations on track and on schedule. Explore Underground drill rigs
children.lead: ​We offer a comprehensive line of service and product solutions to keep your underground drill rigs running at peak performance, including upgrades, leasing, custom engineered solutions and safety products.
children.body:
​Productivity and safety improvements for underground drilling

Sandvik offers a complete range of services and solutions to increase your penetration rate, extend equipment lifespan, control your costs and minimize your risks in an underground drilling environment. In addition to standard parts provision, upgrades and leasing, we offer custom-engineered solutions that are tailored to your unique requirements and meet all standards and OEM certifications.

children.title: Fire suppression systems
children.subtitle: Protect your underground drilling operations
children.description:
Protect your underground drilling operations with fast protection that limits the consequences of a fire.
Explore fire suppression
children.lead: ​Effective and easy to use, our fire suppression systems help ensure the safety of your personnel and equipment underground.
children.body:
​Our fire suppression systems feature our world-first Eclipse™ foam, which suppresses fires faster and minimizes environmental impact. Eclipse™ foam is specifically designed to suppress hydrocarbon fuel and oil fires. When a hydrocarbon fuel ignites, the vapors and not the fuel burns. Eclipse™ foam cuts off the oxygen supply, acting as a vapor seal over the fuel, while the water content in the foam cools the area, greatly reducing the risk of re-ignition.

 

Eclipse is only applicable for markets where operational temperatures do not fall below 0 degrees Celsius.

children.title: Crushing and screening
children.subtitle: Built to outperform
children.description: Innovative, tested and patented solutions for optimizing crushing and screening in real time and performing under pressure will boost productivity in your toughest applications. Explore Crushing and Screening
children.lead: ​Sandvik crushing and screening equipment employs smart functions to ensure they automatically run at maximum performance all the time.
children.body:
More from your ore

Sandvik crushers and screens employ an aggressive crushing action that processes more ore while maintaining product size, resulting in more throughput. Choose from a range of crushing chambers suited for the exact application and conditions you need. Constant feed size opening and automatic wear compensation maximizes and maintains production capacity throughout liner life.

children.title: Wear protection
children.subtitle: Longer, safer equipment life
children.description: Enjoy extended equipment life, safe handling, minimized noise levels, reduced maintenance and operating costs and easy handling with our proven designs. Explore Wear protection
children.lead: ​Sandvik provides a wide and versatile range of wear protection products that extend equipment life, offer safe handling, minimize noise levels, reduce maintenance and operating costs and are easy to handle.
children.body:
​Reduce your operational costs

Sandvik wear protection solutions include cast-in carbide, ceramic, rubber products and impact bars all designed to withstand the rigors of your harsh mining environment. Reducing operational costs, our solutions also improve safety and extend the times between services for optimal uptime in your mine.

children.title: Cast-in carbide
children.subtitle: Built to withstand harsh handling
children.description: Our cast-in carbide is a unique wear material that combines durability, shock resistance, ductility and strength to withstand harsh material handling applications. Explore Cast-in carbide
children.lead: ​Our cast-in carbide is a unique wear material that combines durability, shock resistance, ductility and strength to withstand harsh material handling applications and ensure your productivity remains at its peak.
children.body:
SANDVIK HX900 LINERS

Our high-performance cast-in carbide Sandvik HX900 liners can be used in a wide range of material handling applications to protect against heavy wear. Rugged wear protection reduces service and stoppage, saving you time and money. Our liners offer a long wear life in heavy impact and abrasive wear applications, extending the time between replacements. Cast-In carbide Sandvik HX900 liners are easy to order and available in standard or custom-made sizes.


Suitable for many applications

Superior wear resistance means immense application possibilities.

children.title: Ceramic wear plates
children.subtitle: More uptime. Less maintenance cost.
children.description: Ceramic  Both protects equipment and dampens noise. Explore Ceramic
children.lead: ​Our ceramic wear plates and sheeting provide extremely long wear life, which means more uptime, lower maintenance cost and improved production.
children.body:
​SANDVIK CERAMIC WEAR PROTECTION

Our WG9200 Ceramic Wear Protection Sheeting offers extremely long wear life in applications with sliding wear. The sheeting bends easily, making it ideal protection for both concave and convex surfaces.


Lightweight and incredibly durable

  • Reduce installation time
    The sheeting features CN bonding to simplify adhesion and reduce installation time.
  • Stays fixed
    Its high bond strength ensures sheeting is securely attached throughout its wear life.
  • Easy to handle
    The compact size and light weight makes the sheeting easy for one person to handle.
  • Suitable for many applications
    Ceramic sheeting can easily be adjusted to your application needs.


WT9200 Ceramic Wear Protection Plates

WT9200 Ceramic Wear Protection Plates are intended for tough applications with high flows of coarse material. Hard ceramic wear plates are vulcanized into durable rubber that functions as a noise and impact dampener.

  • Space no object
    The plates are ideal when weight and space are limiting factors.
  • Extended intervals between replacement
    Extremely long wear life saves on service and replacement.
  • Cut to size
    The plates are easily cut with no need for expensive diamond blades.
  • Cost-effective to install and maintain
    The low-friction, smooth surface keeps production going, minimizing downtime.

children.title: Rubber wear plates
children.subtitle: Versatile, long-lasting wear protection
children.description: Rubber Versatile wear protection that can be tailor-made to fit your needs. Explore Rubber
children.lead: ​Sandvik long-lasting rubber wear plates come with full steel backing or extruded aluminum profiles. They provide versatile wear protection that can be tailor-made to fit your needs.
children.body:
​Choose the rubber wear plate that suits you

Our rubber wear plates come in five different forms and strengths to suit the exact application you require.

children.title: Impact bars
children.subtitle: Perfect protection for belts and conveyors
children.description: Impact bars Protection for belts and conveyors in the loading zone. Explore Impact bars
children.lead: ​Protect your belts and conveyors in the loading zone with our impact bars that feature a top surface of low friction material and a core of durable, impact-absorbing rubber.
children.body:
WT1000 Impact Bars

Featuring a top surface of low-friction material and a core of soft impact-absorbing rubber, WT1000 Impact Bars protect conveyor belts and conveyors. They are ideal for loading zones and transfer points. The impact bars have an extruded aluminum profile for quick and safe installation.

children.title: Rebuilds and major components
children.subtitle: Double the service life for a fraction of the cost
children.description: Upgrade your equipment to the latest technology to improve your profitability.
children.lead: ​Safe, reliable, rebuilt Sandvik machines have a proven, safe, productive and reliable lifetime in the toughest applications. When major components start to fail and equipment nears the end of its first life it can be restored to its original condition.
children.body:

children.title: Equipment rebuilds
children.subtitle: When old becomes new again
children.description: Equipment Rebuilds Enjoyhigh performance, a longer life and significant savings from your equipment Explore equipment rebuilds
children.lead: ​Your safe, productive and reliable Sandvik equipment has proven its worth. But even the best machines need to be rebuilt. Our equipment rebuilds and upgrades extend the lifetime of units, reducing unexpected downtime and enhancing machinery with latest safety features. And it’s more cost-efficient to rebuild a machine than buy a new one.
children.body:
Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.

 

 * Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Loaders
children.subtitle: Reliable, productive and safe rebuilds
children.description: Choose the scope of service from full rebuilds, partial rebuilds of selected subsystems or incorporate safety improvements and productivity upgrades for key loader components. Explore loaders
children.lead: ​A Sandvik loader rebuild is an investment in productivity, reliability and safety. Your loader returns in “as new” condition, gaining as many as 12,000 additional production hours from your original investment.
children.body:
Safety upgrades

Our safety upgrades include for example upgrades of fire suppression, LED lighting, side and reverse cameras, recovery systems and safety railings.

Productivity upgrades

Sandvik productivity upgrades include Sandvik GET (Ground Engaging Tools), axles exhaust systems, engine upgrades for greater fuel savings and reduced environmental footprint; hydraulic system upgrades and much more.

Improve productivity, reduce maintenance costs

Backed up by a 12-month/1,000-hour warranty, original Sandvik parts and systematic processes you can reduce maintenance costs by a factor of 20. Our expert engineers ensure rebuild quality and minimized turnaround time, increasing your productivity.

 

Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.




 * Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Mechanical cutting
children.subtitle: Extend lifetimes beyond 20 years
children.description:
Upgrade machines or key components of the cutting system using the latest technology for extended performance.
Explore mechanical cutting
children.lead: ​Rebuilding mechanical cutting machines increase machine lifetime and can raise process efficiency by up to 80 percent when upgrading all key components with latest technology. Our machines can be rebuilt up to four times, giving them a lifetime of more than 20 years.

children.title: Major components
children.subtitle: Major protection for your valuable equipment
children.description: Our component exchange, new-for-old and repair-and-return programs offer superior uptime. Explore major components
children.lead: ​Protect your business from unexpected stoppages with our major component programs.
children.body:
Lower cost of ownership, maximize productivity

We engineer Sandvik equipment for safety, productivity and reliability in the toughest mining conditions. Our essential parts and components, quick logistical processes and trained service technicians, help you protect your investment and keep it productive 365 days a year. Ahead of planned maintenance or during component failure, select from one of our major component solutions and benefit from cost advantages without having to compromise on quality or warranty. Each solution comes with its own unique advantages but what they all have in common is their focus on lowering your total cost of ownership whilst maximizing your productivity.

 

Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.

children.title: New-for-old program
children.subtitle: Save while you enjoy peace of mind
children.description: Avoid the cost of disposing of old parts, and save money on new, fully-warrantied parts. Explore New-for-old
children.lead: ​Our cost-efficient new-for-old program offers you a new part at a reduced price, when you return your old used parts. You'll benefit from reduced downtime while maximizing your operating economy. The program is available for selected parts families such as cylinders and offered under a special agreement.
children.body:
​Improve site safety

Some motors consist of up to 20 cylinders and the reliability of the machine is at risk if one be-comes weak. By exchanging old cylinders for new, you can protect your equipment and machinery from leaking cylinders or frustrating unplanned movement during operation, benefiting both your equipment and the people who work with it.

 

Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.

children.title: Repair and return program
children.subtitle: Reliable performance and cost savings
children.description: Minimize downtime and save up to 25% compared to purchasing new products. Explore Repair-and-return
children.lead: ​Maintain continuous productivity while saving on the cost of purchasing new components.
children.body:
Warranty

Receive the same warranty as a new component with our standard Component repair and Return solution.
